backend/main.mo: Defines the canister’s data models, access control, lesson and vocabulary structures, and permission logic for creating, editing, and storing lessons, words, ayahs, notes, and quizzes.
feature_evidence.json: Contains a feature evidence report linking rich‑text HTML rendering updates to the specific frontend file implementing them.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists concise summaries for all major frontend files describing their roles in UI, routing, PWA, lessons, and data interactions.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring PWA metadata, icons, manifest, and root mount element.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme, language settings, and orientation rules.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing caching, asset preloading, cache cleanup, and offline fallback behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication flow, profile setup, service worker registration, and overall layout rendering.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component showing app branding and a user menu with profile, settings, and logout options.
frontend/src/components/LessonContentHtm: Component that sanitizes lesson HTML and renders full or truncated rich‑text content safely.
frontend/src/components/LessonContentRic: Rich text editor component using contentEditable with formatting buttons and link insertion, syncing HTML content via onChange.
frontend/src/components/MainLayout.tsx: Top-level layout managing navigation between pages such as lessons, quizzes, vocabulary, and whiteboard using internal state.
frontend/src/components/NoteDialog.tsx: Dialog for viewing, creating, editing, and deleting notes tied to an associated item, with async mutations and confirmation prompts.
frontend/src/components/ProfileDialog.ts: User profile editor allowing name and avatar updates, including image upload, preview, and backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Initial profile setup modal that collects and submits the user's name to create a new profile.
frontend/src/components/PWAInstallDialog: Handles PWA installation prompt logic and displays a popup guiding users to install the app when available.
frontend/src/components/SettingsDialog.t: Provides a settings dialog with theme toggle and an admin-only option to reset app data with confirmation.
frontend/src/components/WordFormWithTool: Displays a badge for a word form and shows a tooltip with its meaning when clicked.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, permissions, lessons, words, ayahs, and related mutations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark mode CSS variables for theming.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/EditLessonPage.tsx: Provides a lesson editing page allowing title, content, visibility, words, and ayahs to be managed with dialogs and mutations.
frontend/src/pages/LessonsPage.tsx: Displays all lessons with options for teachers to create, edit, delete, toggle active status and visibility, and for students to view lessons.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login screen using Internet Identity with branding and a simple authentication button.
frontend/src/pages/NewLessonPage.tsx: Provides a full lesson-creation form allowing entry of content, visibility settings, words, and ayahs with editing dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/NewQuizPage.tsx: Form for creating a new quiz by choosing a title and quiz type, then submitting to backend.
frontend/src/pages/NotesPage.tsx: Shows a user's saved notes with delete capability and handles loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/QuizPage.tsx: Lists available quizzes, allows teachers to create or delete quizzes, and lets users start taking a quiz.
frontend/src/pages/TakeQuizPage.tsx: Implements a quiz-taking interface supporting flip-card and multiple-choice modes, managing question flow, answers, and results.
frontend/src/pages/ViewLessonPage.tsx: Displays a lesson with expandable rich-text content and associated words and ayahs, handling loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/VocabularyPage.tsx: Shows all vocabulary across lessons with sorting, reveal toggles, details dialog, and admin word deletion.
frontend/src/pages/WhiteboardPage.tsx: Displays the active lesson with expandable content, words, ayahs, and supports adding notes to lesson items.
frontend/src/utils/safeHtml.ts: Provides functions to sanitize HTML by removing unsafe elements and safely truncate HTML while preserving structure.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and session storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, and feature requests related to rendering section text as rich rich text instead of raw HTML.
